name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior PHP Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in high-performance solutions, primarily utilizing **PHP**, **Symfony**, and **Laravel**. Proficient in modern software engineering practices and OOP principles including SOLID, I have a strong background in designing and implementing **RESTful APIs**, relational databases with **MySQL**, and NoSQL databases like **MongoDB** and **DynamoDB**. My extensive experience in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and **service-oriented architecture** ensures robust and scalable application development.

I am adept in CI/CD pipelines, leveraging tools such as **Git**, **Docker**, and **infrastructure-as-code** practices to deliver efficient deployment pipelines. With practical knowledge in cloud environments like **AWS** and serverless technologies, I ensure reliable application performance and compliance with industry standards. My strong problem-solving skills and adaptability allow me to collaborate effectively within teams to drive project success while creating innovative backend solutions.
